Judul: Oxygen vacancy induced performance enhancement of toluene catalytic oxidation using LaFeO3 perovskite oxides
Abstrak:
Surface oxygen vacancies have been demonstrated to be an important factor for volatile organic compounds
(VOCs) catalytic oxidation. In this work, the oxygen vacancy over LaFeO3 perovskite oxides was tuned by the
way of controlling A-site cation deficiency. The catalysts were synthesized through the Pechini method and
investigated for the complete oxidation of toluene.....
Kata Kunci: Perovskite, Catalytic oxidation, DFT, LaFeO3, Oxygen vacancy, Toluene
